sections.heading: officers; duty to report to Governor
sections.text: It shall be the duty of the several officers of the executive department to make a written report to the Governor of the public business entrusted to their charge, whenever required by him so to do.SourceLaws 1867, § 2, p. 101;R.S.1913, § 5532;C.S.1922, § 4828;C.

84-102.Executive officers; duty to report to Governor.

It shall be the duty of the several officers of the executive department to make a written report to the Governor of the public business entrusted to their charge, whenever required by him so to do.

SourceLaws 1867, § 2, p. 101;R.S.1913, § 5532;C.S.1922, § 4828;C.S.1929, § 84-103;R.S.1943, § 84-102.
